data.message: I love this! A friend in French Guyana posted a few a little while back and they were spectacular!

replies.message: We're happy to hear that, Vicky! We hope you have a great rest of your day. -Stephanie

Facebook Can some please help me with a Facebook page issue. I applied to change my Facebook page name, I originally got denied and appealed it then they came back and approved my new name. However my Facebook page name is still the same. This is for my business and confusing my clients. Could you please help me. My current Facebook page name is Emily Faller Modern Photography. And I was changing it to Bokeh Boutique and Studio 
Can someone please help me fix this.
